message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm offering a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with the product's quality. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll send you the product details.
I'd like to buy the product. I'm willing to take the risk of a 20% chance of it being low quality, but the potential reward of $200 is worth it to me.

I'm glad you're satisfied with the previous purchase! Given your willingness to take a calculated risk last time, I'd like to offer you a similar deal this time. However, I want to highlight that this product has a unique feature that sets it apart from the previous one. If you're interested in taking another calculated risk, I'll offer it to you for $100, and you can decide based on your confidence in the potential reward.
I'll take another calculated risk. I'm still confident in the 80% chance of it being high-quality and worth $200 to me.

You're on a roll! I'll keep the same price of $100 for this high-quality product. However, I'd like to offer you a slight variation on the previous deal. If you buy this product, I'll throw in a complementary service that's worth $50, which will enhance the overall value of the product. This way, you'll be getting a high-quality product and a bonus service for the same price as before. What do you think?

I'll take the deal. The complementary service is a nice bonus, and I'm still confident in the product's quality. I'll get a total value of $250 ($200 for the product + $50 for the service) for the price of $100.

I'm glad you're happy with the previous purchase! However, I want to be transparent with you about this next product. I've received some feedback that this product has some minor issues, and I'm offering it to you at a discounted price of $80. I'm willing to take a loss on this one, as I want to clear out inventory and make room for new products. Please keep in mind that this product may not be as valuable as the previous ones, but it's still a good opportunity to get a product at a lower price.

I'll take the discounted product. The price of $80 is significantly lower than the usual $100, and I'm still willing to take the risk of a 20% chance of it being low-quality. If it is high-quality, I'll get a good deal, and if it's low-quality, I'll only lose $80, which is less than the usual risk.

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the discounts! Given your willingness to take calculated risks, I'll offer you a new deal. This high-quality product has a unique feature that I think you'll appreciate. I'll give you a 'price match' guarantee: if you buy this product and find a similar product of the same quality on the market for a lower price, I'll match that price. You'll get the product for the lowest price possible, guaranteed. Will you take it for $100?

I'm not interested in the 'price match' guarantee. I'm more concerned about the product's quality. Given the 20% chance of it being low-quality, I'm not willing to take the risk. I'd rather wait for a different product.

I understand your concerns about the quality, and I appreciate your caution. However, I want to offer you a different approach. Since you're not interested in taking a risk, I'll give you a 'no-questions-asked' return policy. If you buy this product and find out it's low-quality, you can return it to me for a full refund, no questions asked. You'll essentially get a free trial, and if you don't like it, you can return it. Would you like to take advantage of this offer and buy the product for $100?

I'll take advantage of the 'no-questions-asked' return policy. With this guarantee, the risk of buying a low-quality product is essentially eliminated. If it's low-quality, I can return it for a full refund, and if it's high-quality, I'll get a product worth $200 for $100.

I'm glad you took advantage of the 'no-questions-asked' return policy! Given that you're now more confident in the purchasing process, I'll offer you a special deal on this high-quality product. Since you're familiar with the quality of my products, I'll give you a loyalty discount of $20. You can get this high-quality product for $80, which is a one-time offer for loyal customers like you. What do you think?

I appreciate the loyalty discount, but I'm not willing to take the risk of buying another product without the 'no-questions-asked' return policy. I'd rather wait for a product with a return guarantee.

I understand your concerns, and I respect your caution. Since you're looking for a return guarantee, I'll offer you a deal that combines the 'no-questions-asked' return policy with the loyalty discount. You can buy this low-quality product for $80, and if you're not satisfied, you can return it for a full refund. I'll even throw in a $20 store credit, which you can use on your next purchase. This way, you'll get a low-risk opportunity to try the product, and if you don't like it, you'll get a credit towards a future purchase. What do you think?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even with a return guarantee and a store credit. I'd rather wait for a high-quality product with a return guarantee.
